channel.title: AI-native 6G on FEEC/UNICAMP IA382 - Seminar in Computer Engineering
channel.description: Recent content in AI-native 6G on FEEC/UNICAMP IA382 - Seminar in Computer Engineering

item.title: Towards an AI-native 6G system architecture
item.description: Abstract # The next generation of mobile communications is expected to revolutionize connectivity through the integration of advanced artificial intelligence (AI) capabilities into its core architecture.
